mapper.sql: v_sales_order.sales_order_id, v_sales_order.bill_no, v_sales_order.order_date, v_sales_order.customer_code, v_sales_order.salesperson_code, v_sales_order.order_type, v_sales_order.amount, v_sales_order.exchange_rate, v_sales_order.fall_amount, v_sales_order.create_time, v_sales_order.update_time

-- 销售订单信息 vso_order.bill_no as sales_order_bill_no, vso_order.order_date, vso_order.amount AS sales_amount,
-- 发货通知单信息 vfs.bill_no as f_sales_bill_no,
-- 出库单单据 vso.bill_no AS sales_bill_no, vso.sales_bound_date as outbound_date, vso.commission_flag, vc.customer_id, vc.customer_name, vc.customer_code, vc.first_order_date, vc.adjusted_first_order_date, vc.transfer_status, vc.is_customs_declaration, vc.create_date as customer_create_date, vc.salesperson_id as customer_salesperson_id, vs.id AS salesperson_id, vs.salesperson_name, vsl.salesperson_level_name, vsl.commission_rate as level_rate, pvs.id AS p_salesperson_id, pvs.salesperson_name AS p_salesperson_name, pvsl.salesperson_level_name AS p_salesperson_level_name, pvsl.commission_rate AS p_level_rate, # 应收 vr.currency_type, vr.exchange_rate

update.foreach:
UPDATE v_sales_order SET
bill_no = #{item.billNo},
order_date = #{item.orderDate},
customer_code = #{item.customerCode},
salesperson_code = #{item.salespersonCode},
amount = #{item.amount},
exchange_rate = #{item.exchangeRate},
order_type = #{item.orderType},
fall_amount = #{item.fallAmount},
WHERE bill_no = #{item.billNo}

mapper.select:
SELECT , vc.customer_name, d.name FROM v_sales_order left join v_customer vc on v_sales_order.customer_code = vc.customer_code left join v_salesperson vs on vs.salesperson_code = v_sales_order.salesperson_code left join t_department d on d.department_id = vs.department_id
AND INSTR(v_sales_order.bill_no,#{queryForm.billNo})
AND v_sales_order.order_date >= #{queryForm.orderDateBegin}
AND v_sales_order.order_date <= #{queryForm.orderDateEnd}
AND INSTR(vc.customer_name,#{queryForm.customerName})
AND INSTR(d.name,#{queryForm.departmentName})
AND INSTR(v_sales_order.salesperson_name,#{queryForm.salespersonName})

select bill_no from v_sales_order where bill_no IN
#{billNo}

SELECT , -- 应收单编号列表（去重） GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT vr.bill_no ORDER BY vr.bill_no SEPARATOR ', ') as receive_bill_no, -- 应收金额汇总（对不同的应收单去重后求和） ( SELECT SUM(DISTINCT vr2.amount) FROM v_f_sales vfs2 LEFT JOIN v_f_outbound_rel vfo2 ON vfo2.f_sales_no = vfs2.bill_no LEFT JOIN v_sales_outbound vso2 ON vso2.bill_no = vfo2.outbound_no LEFT JOIN v_receivables vr2 ON vso2.bill_no = vr2.origin_bill_no WHERE vfs2.origin_bill_no = vso_order.bill_no AND vr2.bill_no IS NOT NULL ) as receive_amount FROM v_sales_order vso_order left join v_f_sales vfs ON vfs.origin_bill_no = vso_order.bill_no left join v_f_outbound_rel vfo on vfo.f_sales_no = vfs.bill_no left join v_sales_outbound vso on vso.bill_no = vfo.outbound_no left JOIN v_receivables vr ON vso.bill_no = vr.origin_bill_no left JOIN v_customer vc ON vc.customer_code = vso_order.customer_code left JOIN v_salesperson vs ON vs.id = vso.salesperson_id left JOIN v_salesperson_level vsl ON vs.salesperson_level_id = vsl.salesperson_level_id left JOIN v_salesperson pvs ON vs.parent_id = pvs.id left JOIN v_salesperson_level pvsl ON pvs.salesperson_level_id = pvsl.salesperson_level_id
vso_order.sales_order_id in
#{id}
GROUP BY vso_order.bill_no
